item.title: Rhodes tips & tricks
item.author: pfm@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: How to rebuild the rhodes gem git clone https://github.com/rhomobile/rhodes.git cd rhodes git checkout 3-5-stable make and commit changes if needed, then: rm -rf * git reset --hard git pull Otherwise directly rake gem Copy files where you need it (on a different machine) gem install -l rhodes-3.5.1.13.2 (version given as an example) Rhodes Database encryption Rhodes uses SQLite as database engine on all the supported platforms and, to provide encryption support we use different solutions depending by the target platform.
